I bought this for a Halloween costume accessory. I put it on and while doing so a rivet came out and the belt just fell apart. I have a lot of sports gear and had some rivets for helmets so I was able to fix it and use it for what I needed, and after I fixed it, it was fine. But I had to fix a brand new item the first time I used it.
